content: tail to weave and close in the gap weave in all tails block if desired purl and pine knits / ironwood hat the best way to multiply your happiness is to share it with others - unknown thank you thank you for knitting my pattern i would love to see your work in progress and finished object please use the #theironwoodhat and #purlandpineknits please tag me @purlandpineknits happy knitting - nicole purl and pine knits / ironwood hat
